Comments_List: This course gave an overview of the major branches of Arabic scientific thought in the Middle Ages through the lens of al-Khwarizmi's Mafatih al-'ulum.  We also worked on critical reading skills and discussed general topics relating to Arabic and Islamic studies.

This was an amazing course!  If you're able to handle it and willing to put in the work, you will gain a ton from it.  My only caution is that this class is way more work than any undergrad class I've taken.
